title: Boom
description: Weft faced plain weave wool and cotton cloth with horizontal terra cotta, brown, wine and black stripes of varying width (1/4\" to 3\") alternating with vertically striped bands. weft-faced plain weave wool & cotton.  Horizon. stripes 1/4-3\" wide, alternating with vertically striped bands. Blue, black, lilac. Cobalt
